resources.string: richiede oltre 250+ MB di spazio aggiuntivo
Synchronization will start on the background after application will restart on wi-fi network.
Observation was incomplete thus it wasn\'t saved. Location or photo is misssing.
Le osservazioni sono valide solo per gli utenti loggati. Per favore, effettua il login.
Shared observations are visible only for subscribed users.

Your observation\'s date, location and note are saved and persisted across devices without subscription, but photos are stored only locally on the device. You will lose connection to them (even photo itself when you shot it from the application) when you clear data, reinstall or switch device.

You are about to subscribe for saving and persisting your photos across all your devices. With subscription you agree to share your observations with other subscribed users. You\'ll also be able to see their observations. All shared observations are anonymous and its note stays private and won\'t be shared. To simplify process your photos will be shared under CC0 (Creative Commons Zero) licence, so you also agree with this.
Based on these observations distribution maps will be created along with other, not yet implemented, goodies which will be accessible only for subscribed users.
If you still hesitate to hit the button below, there is a 30 days trial period for both subscriptions.
Crea e salva la tua osservazione. Le osservazioni devono riportare la data, la posizione e almeno una foto. Le note personali non sono obbligatorie.
Switch between your own and shared observations.
Usa la fotocamera per scattare una foto al fiore. Le osservazioni devono contenere almeno una foto.
Scegli una foto sul tuo dispositivo. Puoi anche aggiungere un\'osservazione accompagnata da una foto scattata un paio di anni fa. Le osservazioni devono contenere almeno una foto.
Imposta o modifica manualmente la posizione.
Salva la tua osservazione. Le osservazioni devono contenere la data, la posizione e almeno una foto.
